entries.message: An outage or maintenance window is affecting a subset of users in this region. Detailed outage information is available in the customer portal if this event is impacting your resources.

service_alerts.subject: Los Angeles NVME Block Storage Maintenance

entries.message:
Event Type: LAX NVMe Block Storage Infrastructure Maintenance
Start Time: 2023-05-11 04:00:00 America/Los_Angeles
End Time: 2023-06-01 04:00:00 America/Los_Angeles

We will be conducting Los Angeles NVME block storage product upgrades and backend configuration changes.  Our aim is to maximize reliability and performance of this product.  Specific client I/O operations may see moderate impact during this maintenance period, but the overall product is expected to be operational throughout.

Note that only NVME block (not HDD), and only Los Angeles is impacted by this alert.

The prior notice for this maintenance window did not contain a time and date.

We will be conducting Los Angeles NVME block storage product upgrades and backend configuration changes.  Our aim is to maximize reliability and performance of this product.  Specific client I/O operations may see moderate impact during this maintenance period, but the overall product is expected to be operational throughout.

Note that only NVME block (not HDD), and only Los Angeles is impacted by this alert.

Specific client I/O operations may see moderate impact during this maintenance period, but the overall product is expected to be operational throughout.

Note that only NVME block (not HDD), and only Los Angeles is impacted by this alert.

The prior notice for this maintenance window did not contain a time and date.

We will be conducting Los Angeles NVME block storage product upgrades and backend configuration changes.  Our aim is to maximize reliability and performance of this product.  Specific client I/O operations may see moderate impact during this maintenance period, but the overall product is expected to be operational throughout.

Note that only NVME block (not HDD), and only Los Angeles is impacted by this alert.

New Jersey Object Storage continues to have reduced performance and some availability issues.   We have temporarily stabilized the situation to a reasonable degree, but note that further work here is known to be required.  The next major intervention for the NJ object product is planned for Monday, April 24th (EST) .

Thank you for your patience and understanding during this troubleshooting and recovery process.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues

We are working quickly to restore service to its optimal state.

Event Type: Service Degraded Performance and Availability

Our Cloud Storage team is investigating a partial outage situation with our Object Storage infrastructure. The following services may be impacted by this event:

- Object Storage Subscription management
- Adding or removing buckets
- S3 client issues
- HTTP 502 and 504 errors

Our engineers are in the process of adding additional resources to improve service stability and performance.
